title: An Eccentric Story, from This to This: A True Story of Change and Redemption
description: "An Eccentric Story from This to This" chronicles the life of an African American young man from an inner-city of America. Using his troubled childhood, his ups and downs, run-ins with the law, legal woes, and life in the streets, he engages readers on a journey. More importantly, his life's lessons learned and how he used them to evolve and change to achieve success through education and entrepreneurship.
author: Jonmarc Dewalt
